history.text: hi there
Hi, this movie was a fascinating one to watch
Yes i know , its  perfect to watch it with kids , ts a cute story about 2 sisters .
I had no idea it was based on the Hans Christian Anderson tale "The Snow Queen"
Year its basically about a princess that has icy powers kind of makes sense why it was inspired by The Snow Queen
The plot does remind me a little bit of other movies where the characters are trapped in winter
Walt Disney Animation Studios always make beautiful movies for kids i am very pleased and thankful for that they never fail to make a good animation movie
Yes it's amazing to think that the same people who made the movies I loved as a kid are still making movies for kids today

Yeah its really nice how they come up with things that catches kids attention and at the same time it teaches them something , for example this movie can give a great understanding that is about love
 , and helping others.
yes, its great that they can teach kids lessons without them even realizing it
yea exactly , specially if its comedy like this one
It's interesting that they work the theme of parental death into the film
i just find it amazing how they can just come up with ideas and bring it live .
Yes the creativity is astounding. I have no idea how they come up with the people who can create something so great
Yess , overall very interesting and beautiful movie i would say. Its maybe why  they scored it an  A+ movie
True. Another one of my favorite aspects is that it's two females who are the leaders in the film, giving little girls something to look up to
yes and its amazing that a men directed it , also other movies like the little mermaid was given created by a man which its nice that you might think a women can come up with this ideas but also men
When I think about the complexity of the plot as the two sisters get older, it's amazing to me that even children can follow along and enjoy this
It helps by giving kids the comfort to know that imagination its beautiful , its definitely a movie that will be very known for years

It makes me wonder how this movie has truly affected children at the deepest levels. I feel that when so many children obsessively watch this movie over and over again and watch elsa run and isolate herself after failure and such, if it affects them on a subconscious level
yes ofcourse i totally agree
So was Elsa jealous of Annas relationship deep down? it seems that this happens often with sisters

no i dont think i think they were both trying to help eachother out somehow , just keep in mind that Anna went to look for her sister it dindt matter much what had happened. I am glad this movie only recieved positive critics
I am glad, like so many other movies, that there is the villain Hans. Kids need to learn early that there are bad people out there and not everyone can be trusted
Definitely
I am wondering how Anna escapes from the detention cell
she has magical powers , i dont think escaping  would be something hard for her
That is a good point. Like they so often do, a man has once again underestimated a woman
